name: Group Training
about: My personal training services are meant to provide you with an enjoyable, customized workout routine that will benefit your entire group while you have fun and make memories together.

name: Nutrition Counselling
about: It's no surprise that proper nutrition is one of the best ways to maintain a healthy lifestyle. I encourage all of our clients to feel their best by combining a customized personal training.

name: Sports Conditioning
about: Interested in improving your game? Our personal trainers incorporate the latest research-based methods to help you train and improve your coordination, agility, speed, power.

name: Specialty Services
about: Whether you’re new to fitness or you’re simply looking for a more exciting workout routine, turn to GYMGUYZ. We can introduce you to kickboxing, a challenging and fun workout.

name: Youth & Teen Fitness
about: Understanding your own body and learning about the advantages of a proper diet and personal fitness are essential lifelong skills. At GYMGUYZ, our youth and fitness training.

name: Virtual Personal Training
about: My Virtual Personal Training sessions are designed to fully recreate the in-home or on-site with small group (2-5 people) instruction for a full hour. These sessions are available in FaceTime, WhatsApp, Zoom or Skype.
